plot outline: Shyamrao Deshmukh is a selfish politician.Hi son Varad was married earlier but his first wife left him in few months while second wife committed suicide on the wedding day itself.Shyamrao decides him to marry again with Sanika whose lover Avinash ditched after she got pregnant.After her getting married to Varad ,Sanika sees Shyamrao's adopted son Sholk in the house whose look alike of Avinash and also shares his habits Sanika believes that Sholk is Avinash .But what was Shyamrao's intention of getting Varad married to already pregnant Sanika.
title: Ranangan
plot: Shyamrao Deshmukh is a selfish politician.Hi son Varad was married earlier but his first wife left him in few months while second wife committed suicide on the wedding day itself.Shyamrao decides him to marry again with Sanika whose lover Avinash ditched after she got pregnant.After her getting married to Varad ,Sanika sees Shyamrao's adopted son Sholk in the house whose look alike of Avinash and also shares his habits Sanika believes that Sholk is Avinash .But what was Shyamrao's intention of getting Varad married to already pregnant Sanika.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Priya elopes a night before her wedding to be with her lover Sagar who flings her to death for aborting their child. Shyamrao Deshmukh the head of University is entering politics and it's become. news everywhere he decides to marry his son Varad to a pregnant Sanika.Varad had a failed marriage earlier while his second marriage was to be with Priya.Sanika gets married to Varad and upon arrival of his brother Shlok sees that he is exact lookalike and shares same habits as Avinash who had ditched her after she became pregnant.Avinash was also the guy who pretended to be Sagar when he killed Priya.Shyamrao feels danger with presence of Shlok in the house and decides to expose him.But Shlok reveals a secret to him which Shyamrao had hidden for years thus creating a war battle between them.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
